msbt.message: Man, can you imagine being a fish in a tank? Just exposed for everyone to watch all the time? No, thank you!<10_4 /> Now, if you'll excuse me, I've got to get back to live- streaming my 24/7 vlog.
I could stand here and watch the fish swim around all dayThese little guys have style and they know how to use it!
Is there really anything to talk about when we could just stand here and observe nature's majesty? I'm just messing with you. What's the latest gossip?
This would be a really cool spot for a date, don't you think?Don't worryâ€”I'm not saying that THIS is a date. Unless <10_4 />Nah, definitely not a date.
Looking at the fish is nice, but I can think of something that's even nicer to look at<10_4 /> Me!

You knowthey put fish that live in different bodies of water together in the same tank sometimes. It's kind of like how all of us came from different places to live together here on the island Are we all just, like, fish walking around on land, man? <10_4 />Sorry, I don't know what came over me.
It's cool that we're getting to hang out together in such a chill place, .
OK, this might be a weird question, but just go with it.If I was stuck inside one of these tanks, would you fish me out?Actually, don't answer that. And let's pretend I never asked it.
When I stare into an aquarium for too long, I start to think I'm really a fish. And that's fine and all until someone taps the glass!
The only place you're ever gonna see some of these fish is right here, through the glass of the tank. And I get it, but sometimes I wish I could keep one in the bathtub as a pet.
Do you think we were, like, meant to run into each other here today? But for what purpose To trade recipes?
Whoa! I thought I was having a daydream about you, but it was your actual reflection in the tank. I could see that happening a lot in here.
Being of fine taste and culture, I'm thrilled that there's a museum on . Now if we can just fill this place up with specimens, it'll be almost as exotic as my wardrobe. Ha HA!

They tell me this is the "fish wing" of the Museum.But I don't see any of these guys doing any flying any time soon.Ha HA! I know that fish can't fly. Except for flying fish. <10_4 />Wait. Are there driving fish?
Did you know I'm a huge fish fan? You'll find me here ALL the time.That is, when I'm not dancing, doing yoga, , or , obviously.
